pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spatial Dependencies and Indices for Extremes // An implementation of 1) the tail pairwise dependence matrix (TPDM) as described in Jiang Cooley (2020) doi:10.1175/JCLI-D-19-0413.1 2) the extremal pattern index (EPI) as described in Szemkus Friederichs ('Spatial patterns and indices for heatwave and droughts over Europe using a decomposition of extremal dependency'; submitted to ASCMO 2023).
